items.sentence: The doctor said I needed to learn to live with the pain.
Tom and Mary met when they were both walking their dogs.
Tom and Mary seem to be waiting for something to happen.
Tom and Mary send each other text messages all the time.
I\'m sorry that I haven\'t been able to be here for you.
Don\'t forget to mail this letter on your way to school.
The taxi driver refused to take us to that part of town.
The train had already left when they got to the station.
All we know is that Tom is coming to our office at 2:30.
Tom sat motionless on a chair in the corner of the room.
